required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics of ACT-1014-6470 in Subjects With Severe Renal Impairment Compared to Control Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Single-dose Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics of ACT-1014-6470 in Subjects With Severe Renal Impairment Compared to Control Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: An open-label, single-dose study to investigate the pharmacokinetics of ACT-1014-6470 in subjects with severe renal impairment compared to control subjects

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a prospective, open-label, single-dose, parallel-group, Phase 1 study.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for PK analysis will be drawn at various time points (total duration: up to 6 days in Group A, up to 4 days in Group B).
primary_outcome.description: For both Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment) and Group B (control subjects)

other_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for PK analysis will be drawn at various time points (total duration: up to 6 days in Group A, up to 4 days in Group B).
other_outcome.description: For both Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment) and Group B (control subjects)

other_outcome.measure: Group B (control subjects): PK of ACT-1014-6470 - AUC0-inf
other_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for PK analysis will be drawn at various time points (total duration: up to 6 days in Group A, up to 4 days in Group B).
other_outcome.description: For both Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment) and Group B (control subjects)

other_outcome.measure: Group B (control subjects): PK of ACT-1014-6470 - T1/2
other_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for PK analysis will be drawn at various time points (total duration: up to 6 days in Group A, up to 4 days in Group B).
other_outcome.description: For both Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment) and Group B (control subjects)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment)

intervention.description: ACT-1014-6470 will be available as soft gelatin capsules for oral administration formulated at a dose strength of 20 mg.
intervention.arm_group_label: Group A (subjects with severe renal impairment)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signed informed consent in a language understandable to the subject prior to any study-mandated procedure.
- Male or female subject aged at least 18 years at Screening.
- Women of non-childbearing potential (e.g. post-menopausal)
Additional inclusion criteria for subjects with severe renal impairment (Group A).
- Severe renal function impairment as confirmed at Screening based on an estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) using the Modification of Diet in Renal Disease (MDRD) formula of < 30 mL/min (not on dialysis).
Additional inclusion criteria for control subjects (Group B):
- Normal renal function as confirmed at Screening based on eGFR.
- Each control subject must be matched to the values of one subject with severe renal impairment based on age (±10 years difference allowed), BMI (±15% difference allowed), and sex, determined by results at Screening.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any circumstances or conditions, which, in the opinion of the investigator, may affect full participation in the study or compliance with the protocol.
